references.paper_title: Microstructure of a spatial map in the entorhinal cortex
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the study of grid cells, providing the initial experimental evidence of their hexagonal firing patterns.

references.paper_title: The entorhinal grid map is discretized
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the modular organization of grid cells, showing that they are grouped into distinct modules with different spatial scales.

references.paper_title: The entorhinal cognitive map is attracted to goals
references.reason: This paper provides crucial evidence that grid cell firing patterns are affected by the presence of rewards, motivating the present work.

references.paper_title: Toroidal topology of population activity in grid cells
references.reason: This paper shows that the neural manifold corresponding to a grid cell module has the topology of a 2D torus, providing a geometric framework for understanding grid cell representations.

references.paper_title: Conformal Isometry of Lie Group Representation in Recurrent Network of Grid Cells
references.reason: This paper introduces the path-integrating recurrent neural network (piRNN) model that is used in the current work to study grid cell function.
